import React, { useRef } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import "./Contact.css"; const Contact = () => { const form = useRef(); const handleJoin = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_lzp1ijq", "template_by3lugf", form.current, "9sWaBq4-ZR5OR4kms" ) .then( (result) => { console.log("done"); }, (error) => { console.log(error); } ); }; return (
CONTACT ME
); }; export default Contact;
